attributes.action: Appoint Vince Cable as Chancellor of the Exchequer.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Extraordinary times call for extraordinary measures. The British public need a Chancellor who inspires confidence and deserve someone with economic experience outside of the Treasury office. Vince Cable is the best person for the job. Regardless of his party allegiance he should be in a position where his experience is being used to rescue the ailing economy of the UK.
